entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Error when calling a method from the NativeAOT static library. #105915
  • [API Proposal]: Add helper to be able to use options while registering services #105914
  • [Behaviour Proposal]: Allow resolving keyed dependencies without FromKeyedServicesAttribute #105913
  • Blazor WASM applications crash on startup on iOS 16.4-16.6 when built with AOT & referencing certain dependencies #105912
  • Lower `Vector128/256/512.Shuffle` to SHUFPS, VSHUFPS, VSHUFPD, VPERMILPS, ... when possible #105908
    10.0.0
  • osx-arm64 NativeAOT Debug build failing with encoding_found assert #105906

Closed

  • Vector256.Shuffle does not produce optimal codegen #72793
    Future
  • [NativeAOT/linux-arm32] long and double thread statics are not 8-byte aligned #103234
    9.0.0
  • Support calling .NET Core-compiled custom executables by symlinks on Windows via the GetFinalPathNameByHandle WinAPI function #3144
    Future
  • Field offset not being set when offset is 0 on explicit layout types. #105795
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix comments around static constructor memory #105911
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable x86 AOT compilation for components build #105909
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Detect avx512 in test infra to cover more platforms #105907
    os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Ensure scenario app builds are self contained #105904
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • [NativeAOT] Respect Align8 flag for thread statics #105905
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Removing incomplete mono debugger experiment #105899
  • Fix field offset not being set for 0-offset #105894
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution, 9.0.0

Updated

  • Fix some core typeof(...) references #105903
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData getting COM RCW/CCW #105846
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix paltest_pal_sxs_test1 on illumos #105207
    area-PAL-coreclr, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix stack trace iteration over exceptions #105877
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid scanning isinst checks when building whole program view #104148
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move exposed module object from `DomainAssembly` to `Module` #105901
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Do not emit unsupported thunks for delegates with `allows ref struct` generics #105871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Initialize RuntimeEventSource as part of coreclr_initialize instead of only when running an app #105902
    area-Host
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2508066 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Partial re-revert of #104336. Only JIT fixes are included. #105596
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Obsolete ExchangeAlgorithmType, CipherAlgorithmType and HashAlgorithmType and their usage #105875
    area-System.Net.Security, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Do not allow a non-keyed service to be injected to a keyed parameter #105839
    breaking-change, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • Fix EventListenerThreadPool test #105895
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Return null instead of throwing in ServiceDescriptor.ImplementationInstance\Type\Factory if a keyed service #105776
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 9.0.0
  • Provide System.Formats.Asn1 package readme #105882
    area-System.Formats.Asn1, community-contribution
  • Run native aot runtime tests on cet compatible machines #105288
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Ensure we consistently broadcast the result of simd dot product #105888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add a native WASM object writer #2643

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] support `System.Net.Http.HttpClient` on WASIp2 #2614
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Created

PullRequests

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Allow for a way to ensure some source generators run before / after others #57239
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "semi-auto-properties" #57012
    Backlog
  • Poor codegen for collection expression spread (IEnumerable<T> -> ImmutableArray<T>) #71296
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix typo in incremental-generators.cookbook.md #74642
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Narrow EA dependency #74640
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Use auto properties #74637
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • WIP #74638
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Include App.config item only for net472 builds #74639
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Update 'use auto property' to support using the `field` keyword #74629
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Handle various cases for field-backed properties #74641
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator (for string type) #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use manual `foreach` instead of `AddRange` method for certain collection expression spreads #74630
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations in SymbolKey.ResolveString #74618
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • SynthesizedHotReloadExceptionSymbol #74625
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext #57162
  • [Blazor] Serving .gz Compressed Sitemap Files with app.MapStaticAssets() #57161
  • NavLink blazor component does not add CSS isolation attribute to anchor #57160
  • SemaphoreSlim is bypassing! #57157

Closed

  • Perf improvement: mvc #57066
  • Perf improvement: json #57158
  • Perf improvement: json, json, mvc #57128
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #57129

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve SignalR tests to use channel #57156
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Quarantine `CanBlockExternalNavigation` and friends #57154
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 9.0-rc1

Updated

  • Remove unsafe from PathNormalizer #56805
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • [release/6.0] Update `spa-templates` submodule #57029
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, pending-ci-rerun, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Picker on iOS/Catalyst should use UIButton with menu rather than UIPickerView #23999
  • InitializeComponent () System.InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Binding' to type 'System.Boolean'. #23998
  • MAUI NET8.0 Android HTTPClient isn't working as intend, SendAsync() and GetAsync() send nothing. But works well on Windows #23993
  • CollectionView rendering hangs the apps #23992

PullRequests

Created

  • Call correct Arrange logic from VE.Arrange #23997
  • Use explicit platform versions #23995

Updated

  • CollectionView Items display issue when Header is resized on iOS - Fix #21812
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    community ✨
  • [Android] Border Stroke gradient can only switch to another gradient - fix #22168
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, community ✨
  • Use explicit platform versions #23966
  • Remove the 'Resources' prefix from BundleResource #23978

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-08-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cosmos: bogus translation error (DbSet<JsonEntityBasic>()' could not be translated) when projecting a subquery starting from another DbSet #34352
  • Cosmos: incorrect result when projecting out-of-bounds element of an owned collection #34351
  • Cosmos: Expression of type 'List`1[JsonOwnedLeaf]' cannot be used for parameter of type 'IQueryable`1[JsonOwnedLeaf]' for queries with complex projection of multiple owned collections and elements #34350
  • Cosmos: KeyNotFoundException for queries doing SelectMany on owned collection #34349
  • Cosmos: "Bind property on structural type coming out of scalar subquery" for some complex-ish projection queries #34348
  • Consider changing the default handling of parameterized collections back to constantization (or inline collection of parameters) #34347
    Backlog
  • Translate parameterized collections to inline collections of parameters, with optional bucketization #34346
    Backlog
  • Enable EF.Parameter for forcing parameterization of collection parameters #34345
    9.0.0
  • Introduce context options to control constantization/parameterization of parameterized collections #34344
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Have you considered supporting DuckDB? #34336

PullRequests

Updated

  • Remove migration lock timeout #34338
  • Change default embedded discriminator property from "Discriminator" to "$type" #34340
  • Don't implement IModelFinalizingConvention on CosmosJsonIdConvention #34343
